title: Is What App fully decentralized? - Quora

response.answer_text: The company claims they are but every time I remember the Facebook scandal and the fact that WhatsApp belongs to Facebook I doubt that. If you are looking for a messaging app which NEVER stores your communication history on any server I recommend using Zangi Safe Messenger. Here is the difference:  [The infographic source: Infographic: Zangi vs WhatsApp | Detailed Comparison]

WhatsApp is most certainly not ‘fully decentralised’. It coordinates itself via clusters of centrally controlled servers just like every other application in mainstream use today. If they ever wanted to reliably claim they were, they’d need to release all their source code to the community for inspection. They won’t be doing that anytime soon.
